info.name: Student Tech Directory - Full API Testing (Full URLs)
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection with FULL URLs written out.

Services:
- Eureka Server: http://localhost:8761
- API Gateway: http://localhost:8080
- Student Service: http://localhost:8081
- Tech Stack Service: http://localhost:8082
- Enrollment Service: http://localhost:8083
- Auth Service: http://localhost:8084

item.name: üîê AUTH SERVICE
item.description: Auth Service runs on port 8084. Routes via Gateway at /auth/** have no AuthenticationFilter.

request.description:
POST http://localhost:8080/auth/register

Register a new user. Backend always assigns USER role.

POST http://localhost:8080/auth/register

Duplicate registration should return 400.
POST http://localhost:8080/auth/register

POST http://localhost:8080/auth/login

Login and auto-save JWT token.

POST http://localhost:8080/auth/login

Invalid password should return 401.

POST http://localhost:8080/auth/login

Non-existent user should return 401.

POST http://localhost:8080/auth/login

Login as ADMIN (must be manually created in MongoDB first).

POST http://localhost:8084/auth/register

Direct call to Auth Service (bypass gateway).

POST http://localhost:8084/auth/login

Direct call to Auth Service (bypass gateway).

item.name: üéì STUDENT SERVICE
item.description: Student Service runs on port 8081. Via Gateway: /student-service/api/students/**

request.description:
GET http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/getAllStudents

Requires JWT token.

GET http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/{id}

Replace {id} with actual MongoDB ObjectId.

GET http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/name/{name}

Get student by name.

POST http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/createStudent

Requires ADMIN JWT. Auto-saves student_id.

POST http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/createStudent

Create second student.

POST http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/createStudent

Create third student.

PUT http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/{id}

Requires ADMIN JWT.

DELETE http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/{id}

Requires ADMIN JWT.

POST http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/createStudent

Login as USER first - should be rejected.

item.name: Get All Students - No Token (should fail)

request.description:
GET http://localhost:8080/student-service/api/students/getAllStudents

No JWT - should be rejected by gateway.

GET http://localhost:8081/api/students/getAllStudents

Direct call to Student Service (bypass gateway).

POST http://localhost:8081/api/students/createStudent

Direct call with X-User-Role header.

item.name: üíª TECH STACK SERVICE
item.description: Tech Stack Service runs on port 8082. Via Gateway: /tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/**

request.description:
GET http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/getAllTechStacks

Requires JWT token.

GET http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/{id}

Replace {id} with actual MongoDB ObjectId.

GET http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/name/{name}

Get tech stack by name.

POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack

Requires ADMIN JWT. Auto-saves techstack_id.

item.name: Create Tech Stack - Spring Boot (ADMIN only)

request.description: POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack
POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack
POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack
POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack
POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack

POST http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/createTechStack

Duplicate should fail due to unique index.

PUT http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/{id}

Requires ADMIN JWT.

DELETE http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/{id}

Requires ADMIN JWT.

item.name: Get All Tech Stacks - No Token (should fail)

request.description:
GET http://localhost:8080/tech-stack-service/api/techstacks/getAllTechStacks

No JWT - should be rejected.

GET http://localhost:8082/api/techstacks/getAllTechStacks

Direct call to Tech Stack Service.

POST http://localhost:8082/api/techstacks/createTechStack

Direct call with X-User-Role header.

item.name: üìã ENROLLMENT SERVICE
item.description: Enrollment Service runs on port 8083. Via Gateway: /enrollment-service/api/enrollments/**

request.description:
GET http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/profiles

Get all student profiles with their tech stacks.

item.name: Enroll Student - John Doe in ReactJS, Spring Boot (USER only)

request.description:
POST http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/enroll?studentName=John Doe&techStackNames=ReactJS,Spring Boot

Requires USER JWT.

item.name: Enroll Student - Jane Smith in MongoDB, Docker (USER only)

request.description: POST http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/enroll?studentName=Jane Smith&techStackNames=MongoDB,Docker

item.name: Enroll Student - Bob Wilson in Java, Kubernetes (USER only)

request.description: POST http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/enroll?studentName=Bob Wilson&techStackNames=Java,Kubernetes

item.name: Delete Enrollments by Student ID (ADMIN only)

request.description:
DELETE http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/student/{studentId}

Requires ADMIN JWT. Replace {studentId} with actual MongoDB ObjectId.

GET http://localhost:8080/enrollment-service/api/enrollments/profiles

No JWT - should be rejected.

GET http://localhost:8083/api/enrollments/profiles

Direct call to Enrollment Service.

POST http://localhost:8083/api/enrollments/enroll?studentName=John Doe&techStackNames=ReactJS

Direct call with X-User-Role header.

GET http://localhost:8761/

Eureka Server dashboard.

GET http://localhost:8761/eureka/apps

List all registered services.

GET http://localhost:8080/actuator/health

Gateway health check.

GET http://localhost:8080/actuator/gateway/routes

List all gateway routes.

GET http://localhost:8080/actuator/info

Gateway info.
